alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 25 at 2:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Pueblo County through 300 PM MDT... At 229 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pueblo Reservoir, or 8 miles southwest of Pueblo, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pueblo, Blende and Salt Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
